title: AI Chatbot
description: AI Chatbot is a full-featured modern web app that enables users to chat with various AI models like Cohere, Gemini, and Mistral through a beautiful, responsive UI.
whyBuilt: To explore multi-model AI integration and provide users with an intuitive and extensible chatbot interface for learning and experimentation.
features: Multi-model AI chat support (Cohere, Gemini, Mistral)
Bot management system to create/view/edit bots
Persistent chat history with PDF export
Responsive layout and modern theme toggling
Extensible design to add new models easily

public: public/** - Static assets (favicon, icons, manifest.json, robots.txt, etc.)
src: api/** - API integrations for AI models like Cohere, Gemini, Mistral
assets/** - Images, logos, and SVGs used in UI
components/** - Reusable UI components like Sidebar, Modal, etc.
components/ui/** - Low-level UI primitives like Button, Card, Input
context/** - React context providers for theme, user, bot state
data/** - Static config data like sidebar links, bot model options
hooks/** - Custom React hooks like useTheme, useLenis, useScroll
layout/** - Layout wrappers such as Dashboard or Auth layout
lib/** - Utility libraries and third-party instances (e.g., Lenis)
pages/** - Route-level components like Dashboard, Chat, CreateBot
router/** - App routing setup using React Router
types/** - TypeScript types and interfaces (e.g., BotType, MessageType)
utils/** - Utility functions (e.g., export to PDF, format date/time)
index.css** - Global Tailwind and custom styles
root: package.json** - Lists dependencies, scripts, and project metadata
vite.config.ts** - Vite build and dev server configuration
README.md** - Full project documentation including setup and usage

readmeHighlights.usage: Login, select model, start chat, manage bots, export chats

title: Fashion Market
description: A modern, responsive e-commerce frontend built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui. Includes product filtering, cart, simulated checkout (Card, UPI, COD), and a sleek UI for a seamless shopping experience.
whyBuilt: To deliver a high-performance shopping frontend with seamless navigation, responsive design, and essential commerce features using modern technologies.
features: Modern UI/UX with responsive design and skeleton loading states
Multiple product categories (Men, Women, Kids, Electronics, Cosmetics, Shoes)
Advanced product filtering and real-time search drawer
Add to cart, remove, and real-time cart updates
Contact page with FAQ toggle and social integration

readmeHighlights.usage: Browse products, use filters/search, add to cart, checkout using simulated payment methods

title: Kite News
description: Kite News is a modern, fast, and responsive news web application built with React and Vite. It fetches the latest news articles from NewsAPI and displays them in a clean, user-friendly interface. The app supports category browsing, keyword search, and infinite scrolling for a seamless news reading experience.
whyBuilt: To create a smooth, real-time news reading experience using NewsAPI, React, and modern tools, enabling users to browse trending topics, perform keyword searches, and enjoy infinite scroll in a responsive layout.
features: Live news feed powered by NewsAPI
Infinite scrolling for continuous article loading
Error handling for API failures and no results

src: Context/NewsProvider.jsx** - Context API for managing news data
components/NavBar/NavBar.jsx** - Top navigation bar with category links and search
components/News/News.jsx** - Component to display articles by category or search

readmeHighlights.usage: Clone repo, set up NewsAPI key, run app to browse, search and read news articles with infinite scroll

title: Pixisphere
description: Pixisphere is a modern web platform for discovering, filtering, and connecting with professional photographers for various occasions such as weddings, maternity, family, and more. The app features smart suggestions, advanced filters, and responsive design built with React, Vite, and TailwindCSS.
whyBuilt: To create a smart, interactive, and user-friendly platform that helps users discover and connect with professional photographers for different events, with advanced filtering, AI-powered suggestions, and seamless UI/UX for exploration.
features: Photographer discovery with detailed profiles and portfolios
Advanced filtering by price, rating, style, and city
Responsive UI with Tailwind CSS and Framer Motion animations
Profile pages with zoomable galleries and reviews
Pagination and loading skeletons for better UX

root: index.html** - Entry point of the app
public: db.json** - Mock backend with photographer data
src: App.jsx** - Main app layout and routes
index.css** - Global Tailwind and custom styles
components/** - UI components (cards, hero, filters, modals, skeletons)
context/** - Context providers for photographers and suggestions
pages/** - Route-based pages like CategoryPage and ProfilePage

title: Dream Steps
description: Dream Steps is a collection of modern, responsive frontend templates designed for e-commerce and brand showcase websites. This project provides ready-to-use HTML, CSS, and JavaScript files, along with media assets, to help you quickly build beautiful web pages for your business or portfolio.
whyBuilt: To provide a ready-made, customizable set of frontend templates for businesses and individuals to showcase products, brands, and services with TailwindCSS and JavaScript, without needing a complex build setup.
features: Multiple pages: Home, Products, Brands, Help, Order
Customizable styles via input.css and output.css
Ready-to-use HTML files — no build setup required

public: videos/** - Contains video assets for banners and showcases
src: input.css** - Source stylesheet using Tailwind CSS

readmeHighlights.installation: No installation required for static usage. For TailwindCSS edits, install Tailwind and process 'input.css' to generate 'output.css'.
readmeHighlights.usage: Clone or download the project and open 'index.html' in a browser to start. Modify HTML, Tailwind CSS, or JS files as needed for customization.

title: Coffee Shop Website
description: A modern, fully responsive Coffee Shop front-end template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This template is perfect for coffee shops, cafes, and beverage businesses to showcase their products, menu, and services online.
whyBuilt: To provide an elegant, mobile-friendly website template for coffee shops and cafes to showcase their offerings, team, and contact information with ease using modern frontend technologies.
features: Fully responsive design for all devices
Modern hero section and image sliders
Contact page with info and social links

public: image/** - All images used in the site
src: heart.html** - Wishlist or liked items page

readmeHighlights.installation: No installation or build step required. Simply open 'index.html' in any modern browser.
readmeHighlights.usage: Clone the repository, customize the HTML/CSS/JS files to suit your coffee shop brand, and deploy to GitHub Pages, Netlify, or any static host.

title: Hospital Management System
description: A modern, responsive Hospital Management System front-end template built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This template is designed for hospitals, clinics, and healthcare providers to showcase their services, doctors, and facilities online.
whyBuilt: To provide a professional and accessible web presence for hospitals and healthcare providers, with key pages like doctor listings, contact, online payment (UI), news, and feedback forms, all in a responsive, user-friendly design.
features: Find a doctor page with doctor profiles
Modern hero section and image galleries

public: images/hero section/** - Hero and banner images

readmeHighlights.installation: No installation or build step required. Simply open 'index.html' in any modern browser.
readmeHighlights.usage: Clone the repo, customize HTML/CSS files for your hospital, and deploy to any static hosting platform like GitHub Pages, Netlify, or Vercel.
